name: Choose alcohol-free drinks from Club Soda
description: No description available

name: Club Soda Gift Card
description: Share the gift of mindful drinking with friends, family and loved ones. Club Soda gift cards bought online can be spent on alcohol-free drinks for UK home delivery. Choose from a simple greeting, or send a gift for a birthday or the holidays. A Club Soda gift card is an ideal last-minute gift for someone who is drinking less or not at all. Your chosen recipient will receive an email with the value of the card that they can spend at joinclubsoda.com/online-shop. Gift cards are valid for 365 days from the date of purchase. Please note that online gift cards cannot currently be spent in our London Tasting Room. But you can buy Tasting Room gift cards in person at the Tasting Room.

name: Rebels Sweet Amaretti
description: Alcohol-free Amaretto alternative, 0.0% ABV, with Almond & Sweet Apricot. Sweet, and slightly bitter and spicy. Why not serve as an Amaretto Sour? Shake 5cl Amaretti with 3cl orange juice, 2cl lemon juice and ice. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Rebels Bitter Aperitivo
description: Alcohol-free bitter aperitif alternative, 0.0% ABV, with Vermouth notes & red grapes. Bitter notes of wormwood and orange peel, with sweetness from fruity grapes in the nose. Why not serve with tonic water over ice (1 part Bitter, 2 parts tonic water). Or make into a Negroni with a gin alternative and a bittersweet aperitif?

name: Rebels Botanical Dry
description: Alcohol-free gin alternative, 0.0% ABV, double distilled with natural botanicals. Juniper, with some citrus notes as well, and hints of rose petal and lavender. Why not serve with tonic water over ice (1 part Bitter, 2 parts tonic water). Or make into a Negroni with bitter and bittersweet aperitifs?

name: Rebels Dark Spice
description: Alcohol-free rum alternative, 0.0% ABV, with sugar cane and oak bark. Caramel, nutmeg and fine spice flavours, with sweetness of sugar cane molasses and a slightly peppery finish. Why not serve with ginger beer over ice (1 part rum, 2 parts ginger beer). Or make into a Mojito with lime juice, sugar, mint leaves and soda water?

name: Rebels Dolce Spritz
description: Alcohol-free bittersweet spritz alternative, 0.0% ABV, with with bitter oranges and sweet rhubarb. Bitter-sweet oranges, notes of rhubarb, with fresh citrus aromas, bitterness and a slightly peppery finish. Why not serve with tonic water over ice (1 part spritz, 2 parts tonic water). Or make into an Italian spritz with sparkling wine of your choice and soda water?

name: Rebels Malt Blend
description: Alcohol-free whisky/bourbon alternative, 0.0% ABV, with oak & vanilla notes. Oak of aged wooden barrels, with sweet vanilla, dark dried fruits, caramel and a bit of spicyness in the aftertaste. Why not serve with a cola of your choice over ice (1 part spirit, 2 parts cola). Or make into a Whisky Sour with lemon juice, sugar syrup, and ice.

name: Jin Jin
description: JIN JIN is packed full of the fermented goodness of 35 combined fruits, vegetables, mushrooms and cultures. A lifestyle drink also good for your wellbeing – and its sweet and sour taste is delicious with mixers and in cocktails. Simple serve: mix 20 ml of JIN JIN with 200 ml of soda water. Pour over ice and garnish with a lime wedge. Find out more at the JIN JIN website.

name: Moderato Blanc de Noir Sparkling Cuvée Révolutionnaire
description: Moderato Blanc de Noir sparkling is part of the Cuvée Révolutionnaire range of alcohol-free wines from France’s leading producer. A perfect drink for a celebration, or with dessert. The nose has light fresh plums with slightly buttery notes. The aromas you can taste include candied fruits, soft almond. The bubbles are crisp with a beautiful roundness. Moderato Blanc de Noir was commended in the highly acclaimed inaugural World Alcohol Free Awards in 2023.

name: Moderato Colombard Cuvée Révolutionnaire
description: Moderato Colombard white is part of the Cuvée Révolutionnaire range of alcohol-free wines from France’s leading producer. This was an instant hit with the Club Soda team when we got the first bottle to try. A perfect companion to oysters, a tomato carpaccio with fresh basil, or homemade tapenade. The nose and flavours are complex with exotic fruits, citrus and white flowers.

name: Dr Zero Zero AmarNo
description: AmarNo by Dr Zero Zero is a an alcohol-free version of Italy’s traditional Amari. The key ingredients are the flavor and digestive properties of bitter herbs. AmarNo contains extracts of sage, Chinese Rhubarb, wormwood, and quassia, considered as digestives, as well as tonics for energy. Enjoy as an after-dinner botanical bitter, or as a key component of a non-alcoholic cocktail. ​Serving idea: mix with cold brew coffee and ginger beer, serve over ice in a tall glass.

name: Crossip Dandy Smoke
description: Crossip Dandy Smoke is an award winning, meaty and smoky non-alcoholic spirit. Perfect for 0% sour cocktails or enjoy with cola and a squeeze of lime. Dandy Smoke has opening flavours of sweet smoky lapsang, pine, deep fruit, cinnamon and clove, finishing with spice notes of ginger, chilli and nutmeg.

duplicateWith: Choose alcohol-free drinks from Club Soda

name: Crossip Fresh Citrus
description: Crossip Fresh Citrus non-alcoholic spirit is a complex and bright fusion of citrus, herb and spice. Perfect for a 0% Mojito, Cosmo or simply with Tonic. Fresh Citrus has top notes of mandarin and eucalyptus. The taste evolves into a multiplex of citrus; orange, lemon and grapefruit. The finishing notes are of fiery ginger and a subtle bitterness.

name: Crossip Pure Hibiscus
description: Crossip Pure Hibiscus non-alcoholic spirit is complex, bitter and bold. Perfect for a 0% Spritz or Negroni. Pure Hibiscus flavour profile opens with floral notes of hibiscus, cubeb and rhubarb. The body develops adding herbal bitterness to the fruit and florals. It finishes with wormwood and cayenne for a long aftertaste.

name: Crossip Rich Berry
description: Crossip Rich Berry non-alcoholic spirit was inspired by favourite winter berry flavours. Perfect for 0% Mulled Wines and Hot Toddies. It is a 2-Star Great Taste Award Winner. Rich Berry has lashings of rich and luxurious damson and blackberry flavours, intricately spiced with clove, nutmeg and cinnamon. Reinforced with a steely backbone of sour cherry and pleasing bitter notes of wormwood and gentian. Hints of raspberry and eucalyptus dance around, tantalising your tastebuds.

name: Lucky Saint Hazy IPA
description: Lucky Saint’s new IPA. Juicy and hazy, notes of tropical fruits. Lucky Saint hazy IPA is brewed with Pale Malts and New World Hops to create a balanced beer. Made with all natural ingredients, no additives or flavourings. Lucky Saint IPA is also unfiltered to retain maximum flavour and body.

name: Nice Session Merlot
description: Nice Session Merlot is a low-alcohol red wine. At 3.4% ABV it’s a great way to cut down on your alcohol intake. Juicy, fruity and smooth. Available in the Tasting Room, or online direct from Nice.

name: Nice Session Sauvignon Blanc
description: Nice Session Sauvignon Blanc is a low-alcohol white wine. At 3.4% ABV it’s a great way to cut down on your alcohol intake. Dry, crisp and fresh. Available in the Tasting Room, or online direct from Nice.

name: Wednesday's Domaine Vignette (Red)
description: Wednesday’s Domaine Vignette is a red wine to be enjoyed with a meal. Vignette has complexity in taste and a long, dry finish. You can find hints of dark plums and damson, with shades of spice and forest floor. Wednesday’s Domaine Vignette is a blend of two wines – an oaked Petit Verdot and a more lively Tempranillo – from the historic La Mancha region of Central Spain. The wines are gently de-alcoholised using the latest technology before being blended with a handful of natural ingredients that lift body, flavour, aroma and length in the absence of alcohol.

name: Wednesday's Domaine Eclat Sparkling
description: Wednesday’s Domaine Eclat sparkling wine has zip, zing and everything you need to celebrate life’s important moments, big or small. It is made with a beautiful Verdejo wine from the historic La Mancha region of Central Spain, and gently de-alcoholised using the latest technology before being blended with a handful of natural ingredients and held in tank under pressure for a minimum of 24 hours to create the fizz.

name: Wednesday's Domaine Cuvee Sparkling
description: Wednesday’s Domaine Cuvée sparkling wine is one for the party people. Its beautiful pink effervescence and crisp acidity lifts any occasion. Beginning with two wines – Airen Blanco and Tempranillo – from the historic La Mancha region of Central Spain, Wednesday’s Domaine Cuvée is gently de-alcoholised using the latest technology before being blended with a handful of natural ingredients and held in tank under pressure for a minimum of 24 hours to create its fizz.

name: Wednesday's Domaine Elan (Rose)
description: Wednesday’s Domaine Elan sparkling wine is sunshine in a glass: a delicate, pink-hued rosé. It brings together a refreshing acidity with notes of summer fruits. Beginning with two beautiful wines – Airen Blanco and Tempranillo – from the historic La Mancha region of Central Spain, Wednesday’s Domaine Elan is gently de-alcoholised using the latest technology before being blended with a handful of natural ingredients that lift body, flavour, aroma and length in the absence of alcohol.

name: Moderato Merlot & Gros Manseng Rosé Cuvée Révolutionnaire
description: Moderato Merlot and Gros Manseng Rosé is part of the Cuvée Révolutionnaire range of alcohol-free wines from France’s leading producer. It is the ideal companion for a salty-sweet aperitif or a seasonal salad. Serve chilled between 6 and 8°. The nose has ripe and tangy red fruits. The flavours include ripe, tangy fruits, with a beautiful roundness balanced by a refreshing finish.
